name: DuckyCoinAI
description: DuckyCoinAI is a platform where we use A.I. and neural networks to create new opportunities in games and entertainment. What makes your project unique? We have a working MMORPG game, in alpha version, on which a lot of work has been done. A large number of working utilities History of your project. The project was over a year in the making Whatâ€™s next for your project? Placing the game on Google Play and App Store, its further development. Blockchain creation, token issuance and blockchain on CEX. NFT Marketplace and much more. What can your token be used for? DuckyAI token is the main element of the DuckyCoin ecosystem and provides access to various products and services provided within our community. It is a decentralized blockchain-based token that guarantees the transparency and security of all transactions. It can be used to conduct any transactions in our ecosystem, as well as to pay for services and goods within our community.
